about_the_game:
Skateboarding: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade is a 2D side scrolling arcade game where you have three runs to earn points by doing tricks on your skateboard. You can jump and do tricks in the air or you can wait and skate on a ramp to go higher in the air. If you land the wrong way, that run is over! How high of a score can you get within your three runs?

This game illustrates that God wants us to enjoy this life He has given us and to have fun doing the right thing! Like in Skateboarding, have fun in this life, and live for God! (Based on Psalm Chapter 118 in the Bible)

About the Breakthrough Gaming Arcade series

In the Breakthrough Gaming Arcade series, play arcade games that express a Biblical truth, complete with retro graphics and sounds!

This game was released on Sunday, September 22nd, 2024 as part of week #183 of Bible Video Game Sundays. Bible Video Game Sundays is an event by Breakthrough Gaming where a new video game releases every Sunday Morning @ 6:00 AM Eastern Time*! (*release dates and times subject to change)

Skateboarding: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade © 2007-2024 Myron Kevan Tynes Jr. / Breakthrough Gaming LLC. All Rights Reserved.

name: Skateboarding: Breakthrough Gaming Arcade

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 or Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel or better
  • Memory: 32 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9 Graphics Card or better
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 50 MB available space

short_description: In this 2D side scrolling arcade game, you have three runs to earn points by doing tricks on your skateboard. You can jump and do tricks in the air or you can wait and skate on a ramp to go higher in the air. If you land the wrong way, that run is over! How high of a score can you get?
